thread.title: Teenage girl dies after collapsing in shopping centre as police treat death as 'unexplained'
thread.title_full: Teenage girl dies after collapsing in shopping centre as police treat death as 'unexplained'

author: mirror
title: Teenage girl dies after collapsing in shopping centre as police treat death as 'unexplained'
text:
Teenage girl dies after collapsing in shopping centre as police treat death as 'unexplained' The girl collapsed at the Southgate Shopping Centre in Bath, Somerset, at around 3pm today Share The girl collapsed at Southgate Shopping Centre in Bath this afternoon Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A teenager girl has died after collapsing in a shopping centre as police say they are treating the death as 'unexplained'. 
The girl collapsed at the Southgate Shopping Centre in Bath, Somerset, at around 3pm today 
Police and paramedics were called to the scene but the girl was pronounced dead a short time later. 
The Bath Chronicle reports Avon and Somerset police are treating the death as "unexplained." Read More Horrifying footage of 'Spice' drug turning homeless people in UK city into 'the walking dead' 
A spokesman for the force said: "We were called to Southgate in Bath just before 3pm this afternoon to assist the ambulance service after a teenage girl collapsed. 
"Sadly, the girl died a short time later. Her death is being treated as unexplained but at this stage it's believed to be medically related." 
The area was cordoned off by police for a short time after the incident. Like us on Facebook
